channel.title: Error, Help Please
channel.description:
mmk.. i know its probably my fault that this error is showing up, but i was wondering if anyone could tlel me what the error is so i could fix it. heres what i get when i run my server: [code]Starting fr33sc3pe server on 0.0.0.0:32594 exception in thread "main" java.lang.numberformatexception: for input string: "2" Java:48> at java.lang.integar.parseint<integer.java:456> at java.lang.integar.parseint<integer.java:497> at shophandler.loadshops<shophandler.hava:121> at shophandler.<init><shophandler.java:30> at server.main<server.java:31>[/code]
so i know its at shophandler, but i dint even edit that, i edited shop.cfg ... can anyone help me?
-Will[br][size=1]Posted on: May 11, 2007, 07:00:49 PM[/size][hr]this is what i edited in shops.cfg [code] shop = 34 @whi@Stuff_=] 2 2 175 1000 157 1000 145 1000 163 1000 169 1000 139 1000 7535 1000 7336 1000 7462 1000 3105 1000 3751 1000 2615 1000 4131 10 2617 1000 2619 1000 2621 1000 6583 1000 0773 1000 [/code]
and i changed it to:
[code] shop = 34 @whi@Stuff_=] 2 2 175 1000 157 1000 145 1000 163 1000 169 1000 139 1000 7535 1000 7336 1000 7462 1000 3105 1000 3751 1000 2615 1000 4131 10 2617 1000 2619 1000 2621 1000 6583 1000 0773 1000 892 1000 893 1000 859 1000 961 1000 4740 1000 6522 1000 2491 1000 2497 1000 2503 1000 2489 1000 2495 1000 2501 1000 [/code]
basically i just added more items in the shop. but it shouldnt be making the error in runserver? also, when i try to login with the error running, it laggs for a moment, and then it says im already logged in. on any account i try to sign in with. so yeh.. help please,
-Will[br][size=1]Posted on: May 11, 2007, 07:05:24 PM[/size][hr]i was also trying to add items to the shop, but i ONLY edited one file, and that was shops.cfg do i need to edit another file to make it work?

item.title: Error, Help Please
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

Check for an error in your shop file. Look around and see if anything is where it shouldn’t be.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Khasck wrote:

sorry, i wasnt using it as a double post, i was using it more of as a quick edit of the first post, as to add onto the first post…
anywho, sorry again :l

-Will

item.title: Error, Help Please

item.description:
@InternalorExternalCo wrote:

Don’t double post, because if no one replies then no one probably knows what’s wrong. :mad:

item.title: Error, Help Please
item.dc:creator: @Khasck Khasck
item.description:
@Khasck wrote:

mmk… i know its probably my fault that this error is showing up, but i was wondering if anyone could tlel me what the error is so i could fix it.
heres what i get when i run my server:

Starting fr33sc3pe server on 0.0.0.0:32594 exception in thread "main" java.lang.numberformatexception: for input string: "2" Java:48> at java.lang.integar.parseint<integer.java:456> at java.lang.integar.parseint<integer.java:497> at shophandler.loadshops<shophandler.hava:121> at shophandler.<init><shophandler.java:30> at server.main<server.java:31>

so i know its at shophandler, but i dint even edit that, i edited shop.cfg
… can anyone help me?

-Will[br][size=1]Posted on: May 11, 2007, 07:00:49 PM[/size][hr]this is what i edited in shops.cfg

shop = 34	@whi@Stuff_=]					2	2	175	1000	157	1000	145	1000	163	1000	169	1000	139	1000	7535	1000	7336	1000	7462	1000	3105	1000	3751	1000	2615	1000	4131	10	2617	1000	2619	1000	2621	1000	6583	1000	0773	1000

and i changed it to:

shop = 34	@whi@Stuff_=]					2	2	175	1000	157	1000	145	1000	163	1000	169	1000	139	1000	7535	1000	7336	1000	7462	1000	3105	1000	3751	1000	2615	1000	4131	10	2617	1000	2619	1000	2621	1000	6583	1000	0773	1000	892	1000	893	1000	859	1000	961	1000	4740	1000	6522	1000	2491	1000	2497	1000	2503	1000	2489 	1000	2495	1000	2501	1000

basically i just added more items in the shop.
but it shouldnt be making the error in runserver?
also, when i try to login with the error running, it laggs for a moment, and then it says im already logged in.
on any account i try to sign in with.
so yeh… help please,

do i need to edit another file to make it work?
